title: Why does my Immunisation Dose shows as 'V'?
body:
All non-standard vaccines (including COVID-19) given after 20 years of age, automatically get assigned a Dose value of ‘V’ from AIR.
MediRecords is designed to send dose values, however AIR ignores the dose value sent by providers, and auto-adjusts it to ‘V’, for all individuals over 20 years of age. 
For individuals younger than 20 years, the record will not auto adjust the dose value.
